attributes.additional_details: Ecstasy should be legalised and be produced by licensed producers, so we can garantee ecstasy will be considerably safer than street ecstasy, and to sink the black market. Tax ecstasy, give the country greater tax revenues, create new jobs! Tax payers money should instead be spent funding the NHS and rehabilitation programmes for those addicted, which have proved more successful than the work of prisons, which as we know, are over-populated and failing to reform prisoners.
